thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, location
thread.title_full: Location, location, location - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Andy L
title: Location, location, location
text: The wellington not only had the charm of a NYC hotel, the location was perfect. We were walking distance to many of the locations we wanted to visit and steps from the subway, which got us everywhere else. The rooms are small, no doubt, but we didn't go to spend the days in our room. They were the perfect size for a bed and a bathroom.
